title: Awesome 2 Bedroom in a lovely small community
posting_body: ['This Apartment Home is located minutes away from the heart of downtown in Culver City.', 'This community are in West Los Angeles.', 'You would have easy access by the CityBus Line 6 and the Expo line.', 'Once in Culver City, you are surrounded by a culture like none other in the area.', 'From diners to cafes and high-end restaurants, you will not have a hard time finding a place to eat.', 'Attractions include MGM Studios, Culver Studios, SONY Studios, Baldwin Hills Scenic Overlook and many others.', 'Culver City is an excellent blend of exciting city life with small town elegance.', 'Property Features:', '-1 Parking Space', '- On-site Laundry', '- Online Resident Portal: Pay Online, Request Maintenance Service Online, Check your balance any time', 'Apartment Features:', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Granite Countertops', '- Bath Vanity and Fixtures', '- vinyl plank flooring', '- Good amount of storage space', 'Please ask us about our animal policy!', 'Some Tenant qualifications:', 'Gross Monthly Income must be at least 2.5x advertised rent.', 'Minimum Credit Score Requirement: 600-650 may be approved with conditions; 651+ for no conditions.', 'Under 600 does not meet standards.', 'All qualifications and information will be listed in our Rental Policy when applying for your new home!', 'Ernest', 'show contact info', 'Minutes to LAX, 24 Hour Fitness, Kaiser Permanente, Kindred Hospital Los Angeles, Ladera Park.', 'abc123, Los Angeles, Apartments, Relocating, Renovated,90056,LAX,Windsor Hills,', '90043, 90045, 90008, 90230, 90302, West LA, Culver City, Marina Del Ray, Venice, La Brea, Santa Monica', '“Please note: Photos may not be of exact apartment home available*Square footage, when listed or from inquiry, is approximate*Pricing is subject to change without notice*Pricing can vary between similar apartments for many reasons*Features may vary between similar apartments*Renter to verify all information, including availability*Rental Policy may change without notice*Price breaks are extended to all Applicants, no matter what may have been previously advertised*MonemCo adheres to all Fair Housing guidelines and all housing laws*”', '#mentone']
